ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Wonderful weekend and advice needed
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for the response.  I was planning on heading to lguk when I hit 32 and trying to actually get in some groups down there.  I ended up getting to
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for the response. I was planning on heading to lguk when I hit 32 and trying to actually get in some groups down there. I ended up getting to following equipment with the proceeds from my forest loop:

Cloak of the Icebear
Tattered Mantle
Lambent Breastplate
EE Bag
Runed Falchion
+9 cha necklace
+5 dex +7 cha ring (2)

All in all, I think I did pretty well.

Gilgurth
Bard of 27 Winces
E'ci
----- Original Message -----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Sent: Wednesday, July 05, 2000 9:37 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Wonderful weekend and advice needed


not related to the cash you got, but you are high enough to give a shot at
asking a supplier/assassin group in lower guk if you can loot a mask of
deception that no one may want. huge upgrade to your mask.

i'm not sure if you want to quest for all your lambent or not, but with 2k
you can easily buy lambent arms, boots, and gloves, with enough left over
for a cloak of the icebear or a lizardscale cloak.

Shada Powa, L56 Wood Elf Troubador
Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> head: Crown of the Froglok King (gift from a retiring RL friend)
> face: Small Bronze Mask
> left ear: Opaline Earring
> right ear: Opaline Earring
> neck: Spiked Collar (or +3 cha necklace for charming)
> shoulder: BS Mantle
> arms: Small Bronze Vambraces
> left wrist: Lambent Bracer (or +7 cha bracelet for charming)
> right wrist: Lambent Bracer (or +7 cha bracelet for charming)
> hands: Small Bronze Gauntlets
> left finger: Jagged Band
> right finger: Jagged Band
> chest: Small Bronze Breastplate (guildmate has a Lambent
> Breastplate for me)
> back: Polar Bear Cloak
> waist: Thick Leather Apron
> legs: Lambent Greaves
> feet: Small Bronze Boots
>
> primary weapon: Bladed Thulian Claw (or Gnoll Hide Lariat
> when in high melee
> group)
> secondary weapon: Silvery War Axe (or Gnoll Hide Lariat when
> in high melee
> group)
> ranged slot: Dragoon Dirk
>
> string: Mandolin
> percussion: MM Drum
> wind: Minotaur Horn
> brass: Horn
>
> I know the collar and cloak should be upgraded, but I'm not
> sure what to go
> with. I was thinking a Cloak of the Icebear maybe, but have
> no ideas on the
> collar. Any other ideas?
>
> Gilgurth
> Charming Fool of 27 Winces
> E'ci
